casebody.data:
Traci KRON, Appellant,
v.
Donna SHERMAN, as Personal Representative of the Unsupervised Estate of Alan Kron, Deceased, Appellee. Court of Appeals Case No. 74A01-1702-EU-348 Court of Appeals of Indiana. September 8, 2017

DISPOSITION OF CASE BY UNPUBLISHED MEMORANDUM DECISION

SHARPNACK , Sr.J. Reversed and remanded with instructions. BAKER, J., Concurs.

BARNES, J., Concurs.
